description: Killian James is feeling a little jealous when Kory Houston comes to live with Rodney Steele and him. He lets him know that he is the one who is there to take care of Rodney's needs! At the same time he shows Kory who is in control here and seduces him. Kory doesn't hesitate for a minute and lets him take control! He wants him to fuck his tight little asshole! He likes a man in charge and needs a good fucking, by a jealous man!
title: All His Needs
